message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but I believe I can find it at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay $15000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a better price than $15000. I can offer it to you for $16500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $15000 for the product.
